programme.title: Impossible Engineering
programme.desc: Constructing the Gotthard Base Tunnel in Switzerland, the longest rail tunnel in the world, running for 57 kilometres through the Alps.

programme.title: Coast
programme.desc: Neil Oliver admires ginger seals at Walton-on-the-Naze, while Nick Crane examines the area's fossil record. Miranda Krestovnikoff explores research into the thornback ray on the Thames Estuary and how it aids conservation. The team also visits Felixstowe, the UK's busiest container port, where HM Revenue and Customs uncover a stash of cocaine smuggled among furniture.

programme.title: Deadliest Crash: Disaster at Le Mans
programme.desc: Documentary examining what caused Pierre Levegh's Mercedes to crash into the crowd during the 1955 Le Mans 24-hour race, killing more than 80 people - an accident that remains the worst in the history of motor racing. Among the theories discussed are the use of untested technologies by the car's manufacturers, the addition of a lethal fuel additive and allegations of reckless driving by future Formula One world champion Mike Hawthorn, who won the race with Jaguar team partner Ivor Bueb. Narrated by Jack Deam.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Kavanagh QC
programme.desc: A family GP is accused of murdering his wife, and Kavanagh, back in chambers following compassionate leave, is assigned to his defence. As the trial progresses, the battling barrister gradually comes to realise just how much he has in common with his client. Also starring Tom Courtenay, Oliver Ford Davies, Nicholas Jones and Valerie Edmond.

programme.title: Trial & Retribution
programme.desc: Part one of two. Walker is assigned to investigate the discovery of a young woman's skeleton, found underneath the patio of what used to be a boarding house, but is paired with Pat's ex-boyfriend Jeff. Drama from Widows creator Lynda LaPlante, starring David Hayman and Paul Kynman.

programme.title: Doctor Finlay
programme.desc: Dr Napier is intrigued by an ex-colonial couple recently returned from India who settle in Tannochbrae and refuse to have contact with their mysterious daughter. Starring David Rintoul, Ian Bannen and Annette Crosbie.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Babushka
programme.desc: Game show in which contestants answer questions to get the chance to open a set of giant Russian nesting dolls, with some empty and others containing prizes up to Â£10,000. Rylan Clark-Neal asks the questions.

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Late Night Magic
programme.desc: We're taking you all the way through the night with soem of the best tracks of all time.

programme.title: Kisstory: Old Skool & Anthems
programme.desc: It's time to go back in time with KISSTORY! The biggest old skool anthems ever from your favourite artists.

programme.title: Up All Night! Kiss Beats
programme.desc: Let the world sleep! But here at Kiss we are still up, still delivering the finest beats for your nocturnal jam.

programme.title: Chart Hits & New Vids
programme.desc: We've got all the hits that are storming the charts right now, along with some brand new releases from your favourite and new artists.

programme.title: All The Hits, All Night
programme.desc: Non-stop hits to see you all the way through the night.

programme.title: Jungle Gold
programme.desc: As severe flooding, problems with equipment and hostile locals threaten the mining operation, Scott and George hope new mechanic Travis can help them to get back on track.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Rob Nelson investigates mysterious tunnels under Denver's airport, then heads to Ohio to uncover the secrets of a giant serpent-shaped mound.

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.desc: Mikey and Paul Jr head to Louisiana to consult with Red Jacket Firearms on a custom gun design, while Paul Sr attempts to reconcile with his sons.

programme.title: World's Top 5
programme.desc: An exploration of factories on a mammoth scale, including Nasa's vast vehicle assembly building and Europe's largest food processing plant.

programme.title: Dirty Jobs
programme.desc: Mike samples life as a medical waste processor, learning what medical waste is and then doing his bit to treat it. Along the way, his new colleagues have some surprises in store.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: The documentary exploring manufacturing processes concludes with a look at how dragster tyres, icing, floating docks and spiral pipes are made.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.sub-title: Rubber Gloves/Soap Carvings/Aircraft Cabinets/Motorcycle Brake Locks
programme.desc: The manufacture of objects such as rubber gloves and aircraft cabinets, and how processes have developed over the years.

programme.title: Forensic Detectives
programme.desc: How, after the 1993 World Trade Center bombing, DNA was traced to the bomber through the saliva that remained on the back of a mailing label.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: How, when a teenager went missing, detectives struggled for leads. When surveillance cameras revealed her kidnapping, the case became a race to bring her home alive.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: The September 2011 murders of Roy Napier, his estranged wife Angela, their two adult children and neighbour Henry Smith. Gunman David Ison had earlier argued with Napier over his decision to add $2 to the price of prescription pills he was selling.

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: A cult member betrays the leader to the FBI following the discovery of a decapitated young male, and is able to link him with dozens of other murders.

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: Animal Cruelty Investigators arrive at a property to rescue some horses, but have a surprise in store when they discover a litter of puppies trapped inside a storm drain.

programme.title: Bondi Vet
programme.desc: Chris Brown helps a cuckoo with an injured leg, rescues two dogs from a rooftop, examines a golden retriever, and checks a koala's eyesight.

programme.title: Bondi Vet
programme.desc: Chris Brown treats a racehorse to see if it can join the unwanted thoroughbred programme. Plus, a dog hit by a car, and a kitten with earache receive attention.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Jackie, who has worn many bridal gowns throughout her modelling career, tries to find the perfect dress for her big day, while Alia returns for her final fitting.
